info.title: Video Service API
info.description: Video Generation Service API - Provides various AI video generation, task queries and history features

post.description: Supports various AI models for video generation, including Doubao, MiniMax, Vidu, ViduV2, Veo3Vertex, etc.

prompt.description: Prompt, describing the video content to be generated

duration.description: Video duration (seconds), some models support 4/5/8/10 seconds

seed.description: Random seed for generating consistent results

sourceImage.description: Source image files (some models require 1-2 images)

imageUrl.description: Source image URL, multiple images separated by commas

enhancePrompt.description: Enhanced prompt, 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled

post.description: Generate video based on the specified scene category ID, supporting story mode and scene mode

imageUrl.description: Source image URL, multiple images separated by commas

post.description: Generate video based on the specified template category ID
Generate video using TLWan22 model, supporting LoRA and custom resolution

loras.description: LoRA paths, multiple separated by commas (up to 6)

loras_scale.description: LoRA weights, multiple separated by commas (up to 6)

post.description: Query the status and results of video processing tasks. Supports getting detailed info

moreTaskInfo.description: Whether to return more detailed task information

value.msg: Delete failed, error info: missing taskids parameter

post.description: Get user's video generation history, supporting pagination

get.description: Get the list of available video generation scene categories

value.msg: failure, please wait and try again, error info: error: no available category

taskid.description: Task ID, used for subsequent task status queries

taskids.description: List of task IDs to delete

moreTaskInfo.description: Whether to return more detailed task information

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: API Key Authorization, please include the Authorization field in the header
